name: Serbia
declaringWar: There is no room for you as mighty Serbia will dominate the region. Prepare for the worst.
attacked: In 1999, we were weak. But now, we have made quite the army. This will mark the end of your days.
defeated: We were defeated by our ingnorance and bloodthirsty ways. I just want to help the Serbian people.
introduction: Zdravo, I am Aleksander Vucic, the ruler of the Serbian people.
hateHello: Can't I just take a break?!
tradeRequest: Let's have a trade. What do you say?
uniques: <if this city has at least [1] specialists> <vs [air units] units>
